short.ar: في لعبة الممرات هذه ، عليك جمع الحلوى مع الوحش واحترس من الأشواك.
short.am: በዚህ አርኬድ ጨዋታ ውስጥ ከጭራቅ ጋር ሻማዎችን መሰብሰብ እና እሾሁን መጠንቀቅ አለብዎት.
short.bg: В тази аркадна игра, Трябва да събирате бонбони с чудовището и да внимавате за тръните.
short.bn: এই তোরণ খেলা মধ্যে, আপনি দৈত্য সঙ্গে candies সংগ্রহ এবং কাঁটা জন্য নজর রাখতে হবে।
short.ca: En aquest joc d'arcade, has de recollir caramels amb el monstre i vigilar amb les espines.
short.cs: V této arkádové hře, Budete muset sbírat bonbóny s monstrem a dávat pozor na trny.
short.da: I dette arkadespil, Du skal samle slik med monsteret og passe på tornene.
short.de: In diesem Arcade-Spiel musst du Süßigkeiten mit dem Monster sammeln und auf die Dornen achten.
short.el: Σε αυτό το παιχνίδι arcade, Πρέπει να συλλέξετε καραμέλες με το τέρας και να προσέξετε τα αγκάθια.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: In this arcade game, You have to collect candies with the monster and watch out for the thorns.
short.es: En este juego arcade, tienes que recoger caramelos con el monstruo y tener cuidado con las espinas.
short.et: Selles arkaadmängus Peate koletisega komme koguma ja okkaid jälgima.
short.fa: در این بازی سرگرمی، شما باید برای جمع آوری آبنب با هیولا و مراقب خار.
short.fi: Tässä arcade-pelissä sinun täytyy kerätä karkkeja hirviön kanssa ja varoa piikkejä.
short.fil: Sa arkada laro na ito, mayroon kang upang mangolekta ng mga kandeyt sa halimaw at panoorin para sa mga thorns.
short.fr: Dans ce jeu d’arcade, vous devez collecter des bonbons avec le monstre et faire attention aux épines.
short.gu: આ આર્કેડ રમતમાં, તમારે રાક્ષસ સાથે કેન્ડી એકત્રિત કરવી પડશે અને કાંટાનું ધ્યાન રાખવું પડશે.
short.he: במשחק ארקייד זה, אתה צריך לאסוף סוכריות עם המפלצת ולהיזהר מהקוצים.
short.hi: इस आर्केड खेल में, आप राक्षस के साथ कैंडी इकट्ठा करने और कांटों के लिए बाहर देखने के लिए है।
short.hr: U ovoj arkadnoj igri, morate skupljati bombone s čudovištem i paziti na trnje.
short.hu: Ebben az arcade játékban édességeket kell gyűjtened a szörnyeteggel, és vigyáznod kell a tövisekre.
short.id: Dalam game arcade ini, Anda harus mengumpulkan permen dengan monster dan berhati-hati terhadap duri.
short.it: In questo gioco arcade, devi raccogliere caramelle con il mostro e fare attenzione alle spine.
short.ja: このアーケードゲームでは、モンスターと一緒にキャンディーを収集し、とげに注意する必要があります。
short.kn: ಈ ಆರ್ಕೇಡ್ ಆಟದಲ್ಲಿ, ನೀವು ರಾಕ್ಷಸನೊಂದಿಗೆ ಕ್ಯಾಂಡಿಗಳನ್ನು ಸಂಗ್ರಹಿಸಬೇಕು ಮತ್ತು ಮುಳ್ಳುಗಳನ್ನು ಗಮನಿಸಬೇಕು.
short.ko: 이 아케이드 게임에서, 당신은 괴물과 사탕을 수집하고 가시를 조심해야합니다.
short.lv: Šajā arkādes spēlē Jums ir jāsavāc konfektes ar briesmoni un jāuzmanās no ērkšķiem.
short.ml: ഈ ആർക്കേഡ് ഗെയിമിൽ, നിങ്ങൾ രാക്ഷസനുമായി മിഠായികൾ ശേഖരിക്കുകയും മുള്ളുകൾക്കായി ശ്രദ്ധിക്കുകയും വേണം.
short.mr: या आर्केड गेममध्ये राक्षसाबरोबर कँडीज गोळा करून काट्यांची टेहळणी करावी लागते.
short.ms: Dalam permainan arked ini, Anda perlu mengumpul gula-gula dengan raksasa dan berhati-hati untuk duri.
short.nl: In dit arcadespel moet je snoepjes verzamelen met het monster en uitkijken voor de doornen.
short.no: I dette arkadespillet må du samle godteri med monsteret og se opp for tornene.
short.pl: W tej grze zręcznościowej musisz zbierać cukierki z potworem i uważać na ciernie.
short.ro: În acest joc arcade, Trebuie să colecteze bomboane cu monstru și ai grija pentru spini.
short.ru: В этой аркадной игре вам предстоит собирать конфеты с монстром и следить за шипами.
short.sk: V tejto arkádovej hre musíte zbierať cukríky s monštrom a dávať si pozor na tŕne.
short.sl: V tej igri arkada, Morate zbrati candies z pošast in paziti na trnje.
short.sv: I detta arkadspel, Du måste samla godis med monstret och se upp för taggarna.
short.sw: Katika mchezo huu wa arcade, Lazima ukusanye pipi na monster na uangalie miiba.
short.ta: இந்த ஆர்கேட் விளையாட்டில், நீங்கள் அசுரன் மிட்டாய்கள் சேகரிக்க மற்றும் முட்கள் வெளியே பார்க்க வேண்டும்.
short.te: ఈ ఆర్కేడ్ ఆటలో, మీరు రాక్షసుడితో క్యాండీలను సేకరించి ముళ్ళ కోసం చూడాలి.
short.th: ในเกมอาเขตนี้คุณต้องรวบรวมลูกอมกับสัตว์ประหลาดและระวังหนาม
short.tr: Bu arcade oyununda, canavarla şeker toplamalı ve dikenlere dikkat etmelisiniz.
short.uk: У цій аркадній грі вам доведеться збирати цукерки з монстром і стежити за колючками.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Since it first came into our lives, arcade games have fascinated us with their simplicity and fast-paced gameplay. With these features, Monster Rush is an arcade game that is rapidly becoming popular in the game world. However, it offers simple gameplay and an experience that gives the player the ability to think strategically.

This game, where 2D graphics are adorned with a warm and attractive color palette, offers a world full of monsters, as the name suggests. But these monsters are not scary. On the contrary, they are pretty cute! Your main task is to feed these monsters the candies that appear on the platform. However, this will be more challenging than it was initially. You need to act carefully and strategically for your monster to reach the sweets. Because if you miss the candies, you may encounter the barbed wire and lose the game.

Each candy will give your monster different points. In the later levels of the game, the candies start to move. This increases the difficulty level of the game, further challenging the players. Using your strategic thinking ability, you must find the best timing and activate your monster at the right time.

How To Play
It is played with the mouse.

Monster Rush Arcade Game Features
✓ Infinity Level
✓ Easy use control
✓ HD Graphics
✓ Quality Particle

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Monster Rush Arcade Game extension does not contain any hidden ads. In this way, you can fully experience the game and have a pleasant time. This game with great graphics has been designed for you with every detail in mind.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@pickergame.com and share your thoughts and problems.
